properties.areaDesc: Caribbean Waters of Puerto Rico from 10 NM to 17N
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued March 2 at 8:39PM AST until March 3 at 8:00PM AST by NWS San Juan PR
properties.description:
...A northerly swell will continue to invade the local waters...

.Winds and seas will continue to increase with the arrival of a
frontal boundary and a northerly swell. This will create
hazardous seas that will spread across most of the local waters
through at least Wednesday afternoon.

* WHAT...Increasing seas up to 8 feet with occasional seas up to
10 feet. East to northeast winds up to 20 knots with
occasionally higher gusts.

* WHERE...Caribbean Waters of Puerto Rico from 10 NM to 17N.

* WHEN...From 8 AM to 8 PM AST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be choppy an hazardous to small
craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM TO 8 PM AST TUESDAY
